      • translateCamera

        public void translateCamera(double horizontal)
        Translates the camera on the X axis.
        Parameters:
        horizontal - A value of the delta movement in order to change the position in x.

      • rotateCamera

        public void rotateCamera(double vertical)
        Rotates the camera around the X axis.
        Parameters:
        vertical - A value of the delta movement in order to change the rotation in x.

      • zoomCamera

        public void zoomCamera(double delta)
        Zooms the camera.
        Parameters:
        delta - A value of the delta scroll movement in order to change the distance of the camera to the x axis.
